email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I hope this message finds you well. We have a vessel available for a coal shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai. The vessel, MV OCEAN HORIZON, is currently open and can accommodate your cargo size of 75,000MT. The initial freight quote is USD 22 per MT on CIF terms.

Please let me know if this is of interest.

Best regards,
Laura Martinez
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the offer. The rate of USD 22 per MT is higher than current market rates. Could you review this and provide a more competitive quote? Additionally, could you confirm the laycan and the vessel's DWT and LOA?

Best regards,
John Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Thank you for your response. After reviewing the market, we can offer a revised rate of USD 20 per MT. The MV OCEAN HORIZON has a DWT of 82,000 and an LOA of 225 meters. The laycan is flexible, but we can propose a window of October 10-15.

Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Laura Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the revised offer. The rate of USD 20 per MT is more acceptable. Could you confirm the demurrage rate and any additional charges? Also, can we finalize the laycan for October 10-15?

Best regards,
John Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Final Details
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

The demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day, pro rata. There are no additional charges beyond the freight and demurrage. The laycan for October 10-15 is confirmed. Please confirm if we can proceed with the booking.

Best regards,
Laura Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Booking Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the details. We confirm the booking at USD 20 per MT with a laycan of October 10-15. Please proceed with the necessary arrangements and send over the final documents.

Best regards,
John Smith

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai - Booking Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

The booking is confirmed. We will send the final documents shortly. Thank you for your business.

Best regards,
Laura Martinez
